price: 54. Oo tab ayey dhigeen, Allena (sidoo kale) tab ayuu dhigay. Allaana ah Kan ugu wanaagsan inta wax tabeysa.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
